job_history.work_description: Planned, directed, and coordinated human resource management activities to maximize the strategic use of human resources and maintained functions such as workers compensation, recruitment, personnel policies, and regulatory compliance.
Provided a high level of support to the National Director and General Manager as well as oversaw PGA TOUR golf and charity events at 31 domestic and international locations.
Worked with senior management to create and implement HR policies and procedures; recruit employees; and develop orientation, training and incentive programs.
Provided a broad range of HR functions, including recruiting and training employees, overseeing disciplinary action and managing HR records.
Provided support to Vice Presidents of both commercial and military operations.
Maintained deductions and payroll and administration of benefits, including pensions, annuities, health insurance, life insurance, and dental insurance.

skills.name: Human Resource Management
skills.explanation: Over 15 years of experience in various HR roles, including HR Manager, HR Coordinator, HR Representative, and Human Resource Regional Assistant, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Recruitment
skills.explanation: Extensive experience with recruitment, including creating job postings, interviewing candidates, and onboarding new employees, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Handled payroll and benefits administration, including deductions and record-keeping, demonstrating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Provided support to senior management and led teams in various HR roles, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Training and Development
skills.explanation: Developed and implemented training programs, including orientation and incentive programs, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Compliance
skills.explanation: Ensured regulatory compliance in various HR roles, demonstrating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Employee Relations
skills.explanation: Handled employee relations, including disciplinary action and conflict resolution, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Benefits Administration
skills.explanation: Administered benefits, including pensions, annuities, health insurance, life insurance, and dental insurance, demonstrating a solid working proficiency.
